name: Puzzle Madness (Nachiten)
description:
This game is a simple puzzle game. Good for when you are bored and need to kill time.

It includes 2 games. Each one has 10 levels with unique images and sizes. They also have a "Custom Level" which allows you to create a puzzle with any image from the internet and with a size from 3x3 to 12x12.

The games are the following:

Game 1 - Slidable Puzzle. Consists of a series of tiles which you have to slide to complete.

Game 2 - Normal Puzzle. Consists of a series of square tiles which you have to place correctly to complete.

The game stores your best times in each level.

This game is available for Android and Windows (32 and 64 bits)
